attributes.action: ensure that the pay and tax free allowances which accrue to elected MPs holding ministerial office is reduced to that of an elected MP for the duration of the Labour Party Conference in Bournemouth this week (24th September 2007).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not right that these people should continue to receive the supplement to their salary and tax free allowances which accrue to their position when they are attending to purely party political matters and are not available to carry out the duties for which the supplement to their salary and tax free allowances is paid.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
